Name: Hover Bots VR
About the game: Hover Bots VR lets you experience the freedom of flying like never before! Hop on your hover board and fly through the city chasing robotic flying birds. Experience what Harry Potter felt during Quidditch. Your goal is to fly around the city and catch robotic birds with your web gun.
Meta Title: Hover Bots VR: Jul 14, 2017, Khizer Awan and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Hover Bots VR? Check out the release date (Jul 14, 2017), developer insights from Khizer Awan, and a complete game summary.
